          <title>
            <string language="en">Running of ink</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Laufen der Tinte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exécution de l'encre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funcionar da tinta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionando dell'inchiostro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρέξιμο του μελανιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ejecutarse de la tinta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how ink from a pen runs when it is wet with water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ink</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Tinte von einer Feder 
läuft, wenn sie mit Wasser naß ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'encre d'un 
crayon lecteur fonctionne quand il fait humide avec de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a tinta de uma pena
funciona quando está molhada com água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'inchiostro da 
una penna funziona quando è bagnato con acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς το μελάνι από μια 
πέννα τρέχει όταν είναι υγρό με το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la tinta de una 
pluma se ejecuta cuando es mojada con agua.</string>
          </description>
